title: Ernest Ranglin - In Search of the Lost Riddim [FLAC]
description: In 1998, Ernest Ranglin, Caribbean guitar wizard, released the extraordinary In Search of the Lost Riddim. If you come to this record expecting the gentle sounds of the West Indies a la Joseph Spence, what you hear will shock you. This is an African record through and through.
